level.heading: Inapplicability to offices of United States Marshal or United States Attorney for the District of Columbia.
level.text: No provision of §§ 1-319.01 to 1-319.05 shall be deemed to apply to volunteers in the Offices of the United States Marshal or the United States Attorney for the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-12
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-12, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-319.01.
